20th September, 2023

Sustainable, Secure, and Smart Collaboration Workshop

HOSTED BY

CHITALY 2023, Turin, Italy

Submit Now

Paper Preparation Guidelines

Prospective authors are invited to submit original technical full papers by the deadline October 05, 2019, for publication and presentation during the conference.

When preparing your final manuscript, please pay attention to the following:

  • Paper size is A4 and margins are at least 25 mm all round.
  • The paper includes the author name and affiliation (full address including country.
  • There should not be any page numbers, headers or footers in the paper.
  • Text is single spaced, not double spaced.
  • Authors are requested to submit their papers in .PDF formats as per the paper template.
  • The PDF file should be editable and not password protected.
  • All pages are portrait (landscape pages should be rotated).
  • Figures are placed within the text, not collected at the end of the document.
  • References can only be linked via CrossRef if they are correct and complete.
  • The paper should be thoroughly proofread to check standard of English.
  • The paper should be thoroughly proofread to check standard of English.
  • The minimum page limit of a paper should be 4 pages.
  • Paper should not contain more than 5% of plagiarized content.
  • Workshop contributions should be either full papers (9,000 words, excluding references) or short papers (5,000 words, excluding references) in the ACM single column format.
  • You can find the template on Overleaf.

Submit Your Manuscript

All proposed papers must be submitted in electronic form (PDF format) via EasyChair at the following link: https://easychair.org/conferences/?conf=s3c

Instructions for Authors

  • Papers to be submitted should not be previously published elsewhere.
  • Authors should take responsibility for issues related to plagiarism, if any.
  • Paper Submission can be done through Easy Chair conference management system.
  • Paper selection will be intimated to the authors via Email.
  • Registration will be confirmed only after payment of registration fee.
  • Accepted and Presented papers during the conference will be considered for publication.
  • Please, remember that for the accepted version of your paper you must fill out and sign the Consent to Publish and send it back.
  • At least one of the authors will be required to register and attend CHItaly 2023 to present the paper in order to have it included in the workshop proceedings.

Sustainable, Secure, and
Smart Collaboration Workshop

The Sustainable, Secure, and Smart Collaboration (S続C) workshop is meant to connect researchers, industries, educators, and technologists involved in different and diverse areas connected to HCI blended with immersive systems, smart cities, and security awareness which can take advantage of the collaboration.
